creator: Maztafazta@hotmail.com
text:
i looked through the entire faq i dont know how many times, and if there was 
something on it, it wasnt in english enough for someone partialy computer 
illiterate to understand.

When i update an html file (through notepad) , it does not update.
only index.html updates automaticaly, anything like links to info.html will not 
update unless i delete my internet files. what do i do, to fix this? 

Might i add a suggestion that the faq's seem to be only user friendly to people 
who know alot about webservers. If everyone knew what all the webserver terms 
meant, they would probobly program their own. sorry for wasting your time.

but thanks for giving some.

Ray

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
This is a support question wich can be addressed at a user support forum
like
http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html

It is certainly true that the docs and faq expect a significant level
of pre-existing knowledge.  To get that knowledge, I suggest you buy
a book.  Amazon.com lists plenty of books on apache and webservers in
general.
